page.title: 16Shopping, N. Lopham
page.content: Shopping can sometimes be a problem in a village, especially if you don't have a car. In North Lopham itself, there are two full_time shops - a Post Office/Village Stores and a Newsagents/Grocers. There is also a Butcher, open every morning. The following mobile shops call in vans: Fish _ Thursday, Ice Cream - daily, Grocers - Tuesday, Bakers - 2 different firms cover every day between them, Fish And Chips - Monday and Friday. We did a small survey to find out which of the surrounding shopping areas were used by parents of our schoolchildren. The most popular shopping centre was Diss (7 miles), followed in order of popularity by North Lopham, Norwich (24 miles), Thetford (13 miles) and Bury St. Edmunds (18 miles).
